name: Tamagotchi Collection
description:
'Tamagotchi Collection' (otherwise known as たまごっちコレクション) is a Tamagotchi game developed by Dimps Corporation for the Nintendo DS. It was released only in Japan on November 11th, 2011. It is the ninth, and final Tamagotchi entry to be released for the DS. Unlike its previous RPG and shop simulator entries, Tamagotchi Collection is a genre of game that dabbles in life simulation.

After a devastating crash soaring through space, your rocket lands onto grounds dissimilar to Earth. Upon waking up, you find that you've transformed into a strange entity known as Tamagotchi- in fact, one is attempting to communicate with you right now! With your unexpected settlement, your journey to return home begins here.

Featuring characters from the animated series 'Tamagotchi!', begin navigating the planet by creating your very own Tamagotchi avatar with distinctive shapes, colours, facial features and other traits. Rent out an apartment, bond with 26 unique neighbours, participate in auctions hosted by you and fellow Tamagotchi for furniture, compete in minigames, and many more fun activities in store!
